Sept. 15, 1950 D Australian Championships (C Grade)
Australian Championships (C Grade) 30 Sacred, March, Set Test and Own Choice Contest Australian Championships australian-championships-c-grade
Australia
C Grade
Sacred, March, Set Test and Own Choice Contest
Three Brass Band Studies
Adelaide, South Australia, Australia Championship include Test & Own Choice Selections Oval March points listed under Sacred Oval March / Quickstep March points listed under Stage March
The scheduled 1949 Australian championships event at Launceston, Tasmania was postponed due to an outbreak of poliomyelitis. It was rescheduled for Easter, 10th April 1950. As a result two Australian championship events were held in 1950; this was the designated 1950 event.
May 2, 2016, 12:53 a.m. April 22, 2020, 12:15 a.m.
